q: DALLAS( AP)- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback title="Michael Vick" href="http://dailypress.com/topic/sports/football/Michael Vick-Michael Vick-PESPT008492.topic"> Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the title="NFL" href="http://dailypress.com/topic/sports/football/nfl-ORSPT000007.topic"> NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation.
